sqlMap.update: update gps_hisData.$tableName$ set processed=#processed#, processedTime = #processedTime#, remark=#remark#,processedUserId=#processedUserId#, processedUserName=#processedUserName# where id=#entityId#

update gpsRealData set plateNo = #plateNo#, online=#online#,location=#location#, simNo= #simNo#, sendTime= #sendTime#, longitude=#longitude#,latitude=#latitude#, velocity=#velocity#,direction=#direction#, status=#status#, mileage= #mileage#, gas=#gas#,recordVelocity=#recordVelocity#, updateDate=#updateDate#, alarmState= #alarmState#, altitude= #altitude#,valid=#valid#, enclosureAlarm = #enclosureAlarm#, enclosureType = #enclosureType#, enclosureId = #enclosureId# , overSpeedAreaId = #overSpeedAreaId#, overSpeedAreaType = #overSpeedAreaType#, runTimeOnRoute = #runTimeOnRoute#, routeSegmentId = #routeSegmentId# , routeAlarmType = #routeAlarmType# where vehicleId = #vehicleId#
sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE gps_hisData.$tableName$ ( [gpsId] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [simNo] [nvarchar](12) NULL, [plateNo] [nvarchar](10) NULL, [commandId] [int] NULL, [sendTime] [datetime] NULL, [longitude] [numeric](18, 6) NULL, [latitude] [numeric](18, 6) NULL, [velocity] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [direction] [int] NULL, [status] [int] NULL, [mileage] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [gas] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [recordVelocity] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [location] [nvarchar](100) NULL, [createDate] [datetime] NULL, [tenantId] [int] NULL, [deleted] [bit] NULL, [remark] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [owner] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [alarmState] [int] NULL, [altitude] [numeric](18, 1) NULL, [valid] [bit] NULL, [runStatus] [nvarchar](20) NULL, [signal] [int] NULL ) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_$tableName$] ON gps_hisData.$tableName$ ( [plateNo] ASC, [sendTime] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
sqlMap.select: SELECT [name] FROM gps_hisdata.sys.tables WHERE [name] = #tableName#

select v.*, d.name as depName1, r.driverName,r.driverId, m.name as memberName, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryTypeName ,t.name as vehicleTypeName , tm.termNo,tm.termType as terminalType from vehicle v left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join (select driverId, driverName,vehicleId from driverInfo where mainDriver = 1) r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join terminal tm on tm.termId = v.termId ,department d where v.depId = d.depId
d.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(v.vendor like '%$vendor$%')
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(r.driverName like '%$driverName$%')
(v.runStatus = #runStatus#)
not exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = #enclosureId# and vehicleId = v.vehicleId)
(v.endDate >= #startDate#)
(v.endDate <= #endDate#)
AND v.deleted = 0
order by
v.createDate desc
v.plateNo
v.plateNo

select vehicleId as code, plateNo as name from vehicle v , department d where v.deleted = 0 and v.depId = d.depId
(plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(simNo like '%$simNo$%')
order by v.plateNo

select v.*, d.name as depName1 from vehicle v , department d where v.deleted = 0 and v.depId = d.depId
(plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
not exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = #enclosureId# and vehicleId = v.vehicleId and platform = 1)
exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = #enclosureId# and vehicleId = v.vehicleId and platform = 1)
(simNo like '%$simNo$%')
order by v.plateNo

select v.*, d.name as depName1,g.sendTime, g.latitude,g.longitude, g.location, (case when g.online = 1 then '在线' else '离线' end) as online, r.driverId, r.driverName, (case when g.online = 1 then 0 when g.sendTime is null then 0 else (TIMESTAMPDIFF(second, sendTime, sysdate()) * 0.1 / 6) end ) as offlineTimeSpan, m.name as memberName ,e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleTypeName from vehicle v left join gpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join (select driverId,driverName,vehicleId from DriverInfo where mainDriver = 1) r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType,department d where v.depId = d.depId
d.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.useType = #useType#)
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(g.online = 1)
(g.online <> 1)
g.sendTime < DATE_ADD(sysdate(), INTERVAL #offlineTimeSpan# DAY)
AND v.deleted = 0 order by
g.sendTime
v.plateNo

select v.vehicleId, v.plateNo, v.depId, g.velocity, v.simNo, g.online from vehicle v left join GpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId , department c where v.depId = c.depId and v.deleted = 0
(v.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(v.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(c.name like '%$depName$%')
v.vehicleId in (select vehicleId from driverInfo where driverName like '%$driverName$%')
(v.depId = #depId#)
(v.status = #status#)
(g.online = #online#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = c.depId ))
order by v.plateNo

select u.*, role.name as roleName from userInfo u left join (select r.name, ur.userId, r.roleId from role r , userrole ur where r.roleId=ur.roleId) role on u.userId = role.userId where u.deleted = 0
(u.loginName like '%$loginName$%')
(u.userState = #userState#)
(role.roleId = #roleId#)
(u.userFlag <> 2 or u.userId = #userId#)
u.regionId in (
#regionIdList[]#
)
order by u.loginName

select a.*, b.name as parentDepName from department a left join department b on a.parentId = b.depId where a.deleted = 0
(a.name like '%$name$%')
(a.memNo = #memNo#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = a.depId ))
order by a.name
select a.descr as name, a.funcId as code from functionModel a where a.deleted = 0 and a.parentId = 0 and (a.funcType = 1 or a.funcType = 0)

select a.*, b.descr as parentName from FunctionModel a left join FunctionModel b on a.parentId = b.funcId where a.deleted = 0
(a.descr like '%$descr$%')
(a.parentId = #parentId#)
(a.funcType = #funcType#)
order by a.parentId,a.menuSort

select a.* from memberInfo a where a.deleted = 0
(a.name = '%$name$%')
(a.memNo = #memNo#)
order by a.name
select a.name, a.id as code from memberInfo a where a.deleted = 0

select a.*,b.name as parentName from basicData a left join (select * from basicData where parent = 'Root') b on a.parent = b.code where a.deleted = 0
(a.parent = #parent# or a.code = #parent#)
order by a.parent

select a.*, b.name as infoMenuType from basicData a , (select baseId,name,code from basicData where parent = 'InfoMenu') b where a.deleted = 0 and a.parent = 'Information' and a.code = b.code
(a.code = #code#)
order by a.sn

select depId as code, name from department a where deleted = 0
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = a.depId ))
order by parentId

select * from role where deleted = 0
(name like '%$name$%')
order by name
select roleId as code, name from role where deleted = 0

select v.vehicleId,v.plateNo, v.simNo, g.*,d.name as depName, v.plateColor,r.driverId, r.driverName, m.name as memberName , v.memberId, v.region, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleType , eb.eContent as ewayBill from vehicle v left join gpsRealData g on v.vehicleId = g.vehicleId left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join (select driverId,driverName,vehicleId from DriverInfo where mainDriver = 1) r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join ewayBill eb on eb.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
(v.plateNo = #plateNo#)
v.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))

select v.vehicleId,v.plateNo, v.simNo, d.name as depName, v.plateColor,r.driverId, r.driverName, m.name as memberName , v.memberId, v.region, e.fullName as regionName, i.description as industryType ,t.name as vehicleType , eb.eContent as ewayBill from vehicle v left join MemberInfo m on v.memberId = m.id left join DriverInfo r on v.vehicleId = r.vehicleId left join department d on v.depId = d.depId left join region e on e.code = v.region left join industryType i on i.code = v.industry left join vehicleType t on t.code = v.vehicleType left join ewayBill eb on eb.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select g.*, d.name as depName, v.plateColor from gpsRealData g , vehicle v , department d where g.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(g.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
g.vehicleId in (
#vehicleIdList[]#
)
( latitude <= #maxLatitude# and latitude >= #minLatitude# and longitude <= #maxLongitude# and longitude >= #minLongitude# )
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by g.plateNo

select o.*,b.name as operationDescr from OperationLog o left join basicData b on o.detail = b.code where o.detail <> 'operationLog.action'
(o.userName like '%$userName$%')
o.createDate >= #startDate#
o.createDate <= date_add(#endDate#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by o.createDate desc

select t.*, v.plateColor,v.depId from TerminalCommand t left join vehicle v on t.simNo = v.simNo
(t.userId = #sendUserId#)
(t.owner = #owner#)
(t.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
(t.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
t.createDate >= #startDate#
t.cmdType = 33536
t.createDate <= date_add(#endDate#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by t.createDate desc

select * from JT809Command
createDate >= #createDate#
(source = #source#)
order by createDate desc

select w.* from WarnMsgUrgTodoReq w
w.createDate >= #createDate#
w.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
order by w.createDate desc

select concat(u.name , '[',b.name,']') as name, enclosureId as code from enclosure u, basicData b where u.deleted = 0 and u.enclosureType = b.code and b.parent = 'EnclosureType'
exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding c where c.enclosureId = u.enclosureId and c.platform = 1 and c.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)

select * from enclosure u where deleted = 0
(u.name like '%$name$%')
(u.enclosureType = #enclosureType#)
(u.enclosureType <> #excludeRoute#)
not exists (select 1 from EnclosureBinding where enclosureId = u.enclosureId and platform = 1 and vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
order by u.createDate

select b.bindId,b.enclosureId,r.simNo from EnclosureBinding b, GPSRealData r where r.vehicleId = b.vehicleId and b.bindType = 'platform'
r.sendTime >= #onlineDate#

select u.*, et.configType, et.status as commandStatus, et.updateDate,et.bindType from enclosure u left join (select e.*, t.status, t.updateDate from EnclosureBinding e left join terminalCommand t on e.commandId = t.cmdId where e.vehicleId = #vehicleId# ) et on et.enclosureId = u.enclosureId
where u.deleted = 0
(u.name like '%$name$%')
(u.enclosureType = #enclosureType#)
( et.status is null or et.status <> 'Success')
et.status = 'Success'
(u.enclosureType <> #excludeRoute#)
order by u.createDate

select u.*, v.plateNo from driverInfo u left join vehicle v on u.vehicleId = v.vehicleId
(u.driverName like '%$name$%')
(u.identityCard like '%$identityCard$%')
(u.driverId = #driverId#)
(u.vehicleId = #vehicleId#)
order by u.createDate

select t.*,v.plateNo from terminal t left join vehicle v on t.termid = v.termId where t.deleted = 0
(t.termNo like '%$termNo$%')
(t.devNo like '%$devNo$%')
(t.simNo like '%$simNo$%')
t.bind = #bind#
state = #state#
order by t.createDate desc
select termId as code, termNo as name from terminal where ( bind = 0 or termId = #termId# ) and deleted = 0
select id, parent_Code as pId, industry_type as name, 'true' as open from industryType order by id
select id, parent as pId, name, 'false' as open from region order by id
select id, parentCode as pId, name, 'false' as open from vehicleType order by id

select depId as code, name from department a where deleted = 0
(a.name like '%$depName$%')
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = a.depId ))

select a.cmd, a.cmdData, a.createDate, v.plateColor,v.simNo,v.plateNo ,d.name as depName from vehicleRecorder a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(a.createDate >= #startTime#)
(a.createDate <= #endTime#)
(a.cmd = #cmdWord#)
(a.commandId = #commandId#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = a.depId ))
order by a.createDate desc

select a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName,v.depId from gps_hisData.$tableName$ a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(a.createDate >= #startTime#)
(a.createDate <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(a.id = #alarmId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by a.createDate desc

select a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName,v.depId from gps_hisData.$tableName$ a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(a.createDate >= #startTime#)
(a.createDate <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(a.id = #alarmId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by a.createDate

select a.*,a.type as alarmSource, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from OnlineRecord a, vehicle v , department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(startTime >= #startTime#)
(startTime <= #endTime#)
(a.childType = #childType#)
(a.type = #alarmSource#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.station = #enclosureId#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(a.childType = 'GpsOnline' or a.childType = 'GpsOffline')
v.depId in (
#depIdList[]#
)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
order by startTime desc

select d.* from ( select a.*,a.type as alarmSource,v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from AlarmRecord a, vehicle v , department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(startTime >= #startTime#)
(endtime <= #endTime#)
(a.childType = #childType#)
(a.type = #alarmSource#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.station = #enclosureId#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(a.type = #type#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
union all select a.*,a.type as alarmSource, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from hisAlarmRecord a, vehicle v , department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(startTime >= #startTime#)
(endtime <= #endTime#)
(a.childType = #childType#)
(a.type = #alarmSource#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.station = #enclosureId#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
) d order by d.startTime desc

select a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(alarmTime >= #startTime#)
(alarmTime <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.alarmSource = #alarmSource#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
order by a.createDate desc

select d.* from (select a.*,a.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ a, vehicle v , department d where a.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(a.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(alarmTime >= #startTime#)
(alarmTime <= #endTime#)
(a.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(a.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
union all select b.*,b.alarmTime as startTime, v.plateColor,v.simNo,d.name as depName from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ b, vehicle v , department d where b.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = d.depId
(b.plateNo like '%$plateNo$%')
(alarmTime >= #startTime#)
(alarmTime <= #endTime#)
(b.alarmType = #alarmType#)
(b.processed = #processed#)
(v.depId = #depId#)
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
) d order by d.createDate desc

select a.* from gpsInfo a
a.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.valid = 1)
(a.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(a.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
order by sendTime

select a.* from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ a
a.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.valid = 1)
(a.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(a.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
order by sendTime

select d.* from (select * from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ as a
a.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.valid = 1)
(a.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(a.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
union all select * from gps_hisdata.$tableName2$ as b
b.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(b.status = #status#)
(b.valid = 1)
(b.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(b.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
) d order by sendTime

select a.*, d.name as depName, v.plateColor from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ a, vehicle v, department d where a.plateNo = v.plateNo and v.depId = d.depId
v.vehicleId = #vehicleId#
v.plateNo = #plateNo#
(a.sendTime >= #startTime#)
(a.sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
v.depId = #depId#
order by a.sendTime

select d.*,v.platColor,t.name as depName from (select * from gps_hisdata.$tableName1$ as a
a.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(a.status = #status#)
(a.valid = 1)
(a.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(a.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
union all select * from gps_hisdata.$tableName2$ as b
b.plateNo = #plateNo#
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
(b.status = #status#)
(b.valid = 1)
(b.velocity >= #minSpeed#)
(b.velocity <= #maxSpeed#)
) d , vehicle v, department t where d.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.depId = t.depId order by sendTime

select a.plateNo, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.sendTime from gpsInfo a
(sendTime >= #startTime#)
(sendTime <= #endTime#)
( latitude <= #maxLatitude# and latitude >= #minLatitude# and longitude <= #maxLongitude# and longitude >= #minLongitude# )
select v.DepId, sum(case a.Online when 1 then 1 else 0 end) OnlineNum, count(1) VehicleNum from Vehicle v left join GpsRealData a on v.PlateNo = a.PlateNo where v.Deleted = 0 group by v.DepId

select f.*, d.Name as depName from VehicleOnlineRate f , Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= date_add(#endDate#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
f.IntervalType = #intervalType#
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by f.PlateNo

select v.plateNo, v.plateColor, v.depId, d.name as depName , (case when vr.ts is null then 0 else (vr.ts * 0.1 / 6 ) end )as onlineTime, (timeSpan * 0.1 / 6) as totalTime, (case when vr.ts is null then timespan else (timeSpan - vr.ts) end)* 0.1 / 6 as offlineTime, (case when timeSpan = 0 then 0 when vr.ts is null then 0 else round((vr.ts * 100.00/ timeSpan),2) end) as onlineRate from (select plateNo, plateColor, depId, TIMESTAMPDIFF(second, #startDate#,#endDate#) as timeSpan from vehicle where deleted = 0) v left join (select plateNO, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,(case when startTime >= #startDate# then startTime else #startDate# end), (case when status = 'New' then sysdate() when endTime <= #endDate# then endTime else #endDate# end))) as ts from OnlineRecord where endTime >= #startDate# and startTime <= #endDate# and childType = 'GpsOnline' group by plateNo ) vr on v.plateNo = vr.plateNo left join department d on v.depId = d.depId
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by v.PlateNo
select v.vehicleId, v.plateNo,g.mileage, g.gas from vehicle v left join gpsrealdata g on v.vehicleid = g.vehicleId where v.deleted = 0

select f.*, d.Name as depName,v.plateColor from FuelConsumption f , Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId and v.deleted = 0 and d.deleted = 0
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= #endDate#
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId = #depId#
f.IntervalType = #intervalType#
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by f.staticDate desc

select v.plateNo, v.plateColor, d.name as depName, f.staticDate, IFNULL(f.alarmTimes , 0) as alarmTimes, f.alarmType from Vehicle v left join (select plateNo, max(a.alarmTime) staticDate, count(1) alarmTimes, alarmType from gps_hisdata.$AlarmTableName$ a
a.alarmTime >= #startDate#
a.alarmTime <= DATE_ADD(#endDate#,INTERVAL 1 DAY)
a.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
a.alarmType in
#alarmTypeList[]#
group by a.PlateNo , a.alarmType ) f on v.plateNo = f.plateNo, Department d where v.DepId = d.DepId
v.DepId = #depId#
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
order by v.plateNo

select f.plateNo,min(v.plateColor) as plateColor, sum(f.Mileage) mileage, sum(f.gas) gas,min(d.Name) as depName,0 as ID,3 as IntervalType,max(staticDate) as staticDate from FuelConsumption f, Vehicle v, Department d where f.PlateNo = v.PlateNo and v.DepId = d.DepId and f.intervalType = 0
StaticDate >= #startDate#
StaticDate <= #endDate#
V.PlateNo like '%$plateNo$%'
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
group by f.PlateNo order by f.plateNo

select d.name as depName, v.onlineNum, vehicleNum, (vehicleNum - v.onlineNum) as offlineNum , hour(StatisticDate) as stHour, v.onlineRate , v.statisticDate from onlineStatic v , department d where v.depId = d.depId
(v.depId = #depId#)
(statisticDate >= #startDate#)
(statisticDate <= #endDate#)
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = d.depId ))
order by v.statisticDate desc

select m.*, v.plateNo, v.simNo,v.plateColor,d.name as depName from driverCardRecord m , Vehicle V, Department d where m.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.DepId = d.DepId
m.operTime >= #startDate#
m.operTime <= #endDate#
V.DepId = #depId#
m.cardState = #cardState#
V.PlateNo like '%$PlateNo$%'
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by m.createDate desc

select m.*, d.name as depName,v.plateNo, v.simNo, v.plateColor,t.termNo, t.termType from VehicleInfoModifyRecord m , Vehicle V left join terminal t on v.termId = t.termId, Department d where m.vehicleId = v.vehicleId and v.DepId = d.DepId
m.createDate >= #startDate#
m.createDate <= #endDate#
V.DepId = #depId#
V.PlateNo like '%$PlateNo$%'
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
order by m.createDate desc

select m.*, d.name as depName,v.plateNo as plateNo1, v.plateColor from MediaItem m , Vehicle V , Department d where m.simNo = v.simNo and v.Deleted = 0 and v.DepId = d.DepId
m.createDate >= #startDate#
m.createDate <= #endDate#
v.DepId in
#depIdList[]#
(Exists (select 1 from userDepartment u where userId = #userId# and depId = v.depId ))
V.DepId = #depId#
m.codeFormat = #codeFormat#
m.mediaType = #mediaType#
V.PlateNo like '%$PlateNo$%'
V.SimNo like '%$simNo$%'
order by m.sendTime desc
